content: Hi! I’m Federico Siciliano, a PhD Student in Data Science at Sapienza University of Rome. My research interests include Explainable Artificial Intelligence, Foundations of Deep Learning and Information Retrieval. I’m part of the RSTLess research group, which focuses on Robust, Safe and Transparent Deep Learning.
